law.catch_line: Options for dependent coverage under group health benefit plans -- Disclaimer.

text.section:
All group health benefit plans which provide dependent benefits shall offer the master policyholder the following two (2) options to purchase coverage for an unmarried dependent child:
Coverage until age nineteen (19) and coverage to unmarried children from nineteen (19) to twenty-five (25) years of age who are full-time students enrolled in and attending an accredited educational institution and who are primarily dependent on the policyholder for maintenance and support; and
Coverage until age twenty-five (25).
The offer of coverage under paragraph (b) of subsection (1) of this section shall include a disclaimer that selecting either option may have tax implications.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2008.
